tutorial.speak:
Adding content to pages begins with sections. Sections are containers that span the whole width of the page, have a background color or image, determine colors, and can contain multiple elements.
To add a new section to the page click the "Add" icon
Click on "Section" and drag it onto the page.
Drop it on any of the green boxes.
You will be given a dialog window to customize this section.
You can give this section a unique I.D. to allow you to link directly to it later.
Below are a list of color combination suggestions based on your websites color scheme. Click one to select it
If none of those combinations work for you, you can select custom color, by clicking the custom tab. Click "Save" when you are done
You now have a section you can add elements to. Double click within it to edit the section settings.
Make your desired changes.
And Click Save.
